recipes.recipeDescription: A grilled sandwich with cheese in the middle.
recipes.recipeIngredients:
Ingredients:
2 slices white bread
2tbsp butter
1 slice cheddar cheese
recipes.recipeSteps:
Steps:
Butter both slices of bread
Put cheese in the middle
Turn on medium heat on pan
Put butter in pan
Put sandwich on pan and grill both sides until lightly browned.

Steps:
